item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: I completely agree. I think it always makes a huge difference in a reader's enjoyment when they are familiar with the featured professional. =)
item.content:encoded: I completely agree. I think it always makes a huge difference in a reader’s enjoyment when they are familiar with the featured professional. =)

item.title: By: oren
item.dc:creator: oren
item.description: I love Yamashita's style, so just having well commented games is great.
item.content:encoded: I love Yamashita’s style, so just having well commented games is great.

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Anytime! I'm working my way towards "Breakthrough Attacking Power," and I'm hoping it will be better too. *fingers crossed*
item.content:encoded: Anytime! I’m working my way towards “Breakthrough Attacking Power,” and I’m hoping it will be better too. *fingers crossed*

item.title: By: pollylop
item.dc:creator: pollylop
item.description: Gee, am hoping "Breakthrough Attacking Power" is not like this, was looking forward too adding it to the collection but I've no illusions of ever breaking the dan ranks (let alone the lofty heights of high dan). Really appreciate your shoot from the hip style of reviews. :)
item.content:encoded:
Gee, am hoping “Breakthrough Attacking Power” is not like this, was looking forward too adding it to the collection but I’ve no illusions of ever breaking the dan ranks (let alone the lofty heights of high dan).
Really appreciate your shoot from the hip style of reviews. ðŸ™‚
